scripts._generate:remote: npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id $NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID --schema public > ./types.ts
scripts.generate: npx supabase gen types typescript --local --schema public > ./types.ts
scripts.reset: npx supabase db reset && npx supabase start
scripts._deploy: yarn link-project && npx supabase db push
